xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
rendering.macro.activity.name=Activity (legacy) rendering.macro.activity.description=Provide a macro implemented with the Notifications Application to keep a backward compatibility with Activity Stream.
rendering.macro.activity.parameter.entries.name=Entries rendering.macro.activity.parameter.entries.description=Number of entries to display the activity for. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.wikis.name=Wikis rendering.macro.activity.parameter.wikis.description=Comma separated list of wikis to display activity for. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.spaces.name=Spaces rendering.macro.activity.parameter.spaces.description=Comma separated list of local serialized references of the spaces to display the activity for. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.authors.name=Authors rendering.macro.activity.parameter.authors.description=Comma separated list of authors whose modifications to show. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.tags.name=Tags rendering.macro.activity.parameter.tags.description=Comma separated list of tags to display activity for. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.minor.name=Minor rendering.macro.activity.parameter.minor.description=Whether to show modifications that create minor versions or not. rendering.macro.activity.parameter.rss.name=RSS rendering.macro.activity.parameter.rss.description=Whether to show activity RSS link or not.
